title: How to register domains without having a business - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello friendRegistering a domain is just like getting a piece of land for your own purpose. Dont feel complexity on it. Its a 2minutes process normally. Here is the process (Im taking GoDaddy.com here as example) 1. Create an account on it ( Completely free )2. Probably your account will be verified within 3hrs maximum.3. Then search your domain which you want to buy. 4. You will be directed to payment gateway. ----- Thats it you will be the owner for <yourBusinessName.com> You can start your business anytime online. Get a good service provider and you can launch your dream business online within 5days maximum. TIARanjith Baskaran

Easy. Same as you got other names. Keep in mind some extensions are harder to get and they have different conditions. .ru you can register only for one year and need to renew annually  .com.au must be registered for at least two yearsAlso you might want to consider to get these names for cheap and it will require you to host them with different providers.For example I host .ru domains on 2domains.ru because I paid only $1.6/1 year and later it's about $10/year compare to godaddy where it's $15/year flat.If you will do extra research and find the cheapest provider for each extension you might be able to save around $50-100/year.
